name: Anterior Iliac Spines
description: A bony projection at the anterior end of the iliac crest.
Provides attachment for the inguinal ligament and the origins of the sartorius and tensor fascia lata muscles.
Inferior to the anterior superior iliac spine, a bony eminence on the anterior border of the ilium.
Provides attachment for the straight head of the rectus femoris muscle and the iliofemoral ligament.
